wikipedia_page.main: Duncan Campbell (born May 1926) is a British trumpet player who plays with Ted Heath and his Orchestra, Ronnie Scott, Syd Lawrence and the BBC Big Band. He is married to June Pressley, Elvis Presley's cousin and regular of the Ivy Benson Band.

response: Duncan Campbell may refer to:
* Sir Duncan Campbell of Auchinbreck (1597–1645), commander of troops in Ireland

* Duncan Campbell (British Army general) (1763–1837), British Army general, MP for Ayr Burghs 1809–18
